techs.name: Agriculture
techs.quote: 'Where tillage begins, other arts follow. The farmers therefore are the founders of human civilization.' - Daniel Webster
uniques: Only available <for [non-[The Affini Compact]] Civilizations><hidden from users>

techs.name: Phytotech
techs.quote: 'Essentially, Affini are plant-tech cyborg/robots in a weird planty synthesis of tech and biomass.' - HDG Wiki
uniques: Only available <for [The Affini Compact] Civilizations><hidden from users>

techs.name: Cyberponics
uniques: [+100]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'Nanotechnology woven into the each cell allows crops to self-monitor and self-correct their growth' - Miss Spira Nomu, First Bloom

techs.name: Macroxenopharmacology
techs.quote: 'Xenodrugs are as old as Domestication. But every new species has unique biochemistry, and thus requires a unique approach to their care' - Miss Spira Nomu, First Bloom

techs.name: Medical Ballistics
uniques: [-50]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'The only thing more satisfying than transquilizing a cute terran from afar, is the look in their eyes when they finally wake up in your vines~' - Miss Spira Nomu, First Bloom

techs.name: Phase Conveyance
uniques: [+100]% weight to this choice for AI decisions
techs.quote: 'We just phase shift the particles in the ground and they harmlessly percolate up toward the anode. We can even recharge the ore deposit later. There is no digging, the Affini don't have mines' - Miss Spira Nomu, First Bloom
